domain_terms.Data Governance: Framework ensuring data quality, security, privacy, and compliance
domain_terms.Data Lineage: Tracking data flow from origin through transformations to consumption
domain_terms.Data Lake: Centralized repository storing structured and unstructured data at scale
domain_terms.Data Warehouse: Structured repository optimized for analytics and reporting
domain_terms.Machine Learning: Algorithms enabling systems to learn from data without explicit programming
domain_terms.Feature Store: Centralized repository for ML features enabling reuse and consistency
domain_terms.Model Registry: Catalog of trained ML models with versioning and metadata
domain_terms.MLOps: Practices for deploying and maintaining ML models in production

framework_description: data governance, data pipelines, ML lifecycle, feature stores, model registry, and MLOps
